title.native: 聖女の魔力は万能です Season2
title.romaji: Seijo no Maryoku wa Bannou desu Season 2
title.english: The Saint's Magic Power is Omnipotent II

description:
The second season of Seijo no Maryoku wa Bannou desu.

Sei, an office worker in her twenties, was suddenly summoned to another world as a "Saint". Taking advantage of her natural love of plants, she started working at a medicinal plant research institute. In addition, Sei's evaluation explodes when she activates a tremendously powerful purification magic in monster subjugation! Being officially recognized as a "saint", she gains people's respect as the savior of the Kingdom of Saluntania. Those who watch over and support her are Johann and Jude from the research institute, Yuri from the Imperial Court Mage Division, and Albert Hawke, the "Ice Knight" who is attracted to each other but is still less than a lover. Even after becoming the most important person in the kingdom, Sei remains obsessed with research, but her relationship with Albert gradually deepens, and there is a new development in their love story!?

[Source: Official Website]
synonyms: The Saint's Magic Power is Omnipotent Season 2
สตรีศักดิ์สิทธิ์อิทธิฤทธิ์สารพัดอย่าง ภาค 2
Kekuatan Sihir Santa Sungguh Mahaguna S2

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Medicine
tags.description: Centered around the activities of people working in the field of medicine.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/watariwataru)

Wataru is a light novel writer who is best known for being the author of [Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru.](https://anilist.co/manga/70171/Yahari-Ore-no-Seishun-Love-Comedy-wa-Machigatteiru/) In March of 2009, he graduated from Meiji University in Communication and Information.

He initially decided to become a light novel writer because he was having difficulty finding a job. He is currently working at a company as a salaryman while being a part-time writer, with no plans of making writing his full-time occupation.
Tsutomu Miyazawa is an animator, storyboard artist, character and mechanical designer formerly affiliated with [Studio Kikan](https://anilist.co/studio/256/).

name.native: スコット・マクドナルド

node.description: [Twitter](https://twitter.com/magicmagico) He joined Okayasu Promotion after graduating and studied there as editor, he collected experience on tv animation and drama and gave his debut on Ninja Hattori. He is currently working for 1000 Yamakoshi. Not to be confused with the other Toshihiko Kojima whose name is written with different Kanji.

__Real name:__ Asuka Kato (加藤あすか)

[Website](http://www.spacecraft.co.jp/yuuki_aira/)

A J pop singer attached to the company Lantis. She began her career in 2007 performing in [Yuki Kajura](https://anilist.co/staff/100077)'s [FictionJunction](https://anilist.co/staff/103691) as "FictionJunction ASUKA". She released her debut album- Reflection on July 2, 2008.

Non-anime roles:
Hom-kun in "Atelier Meruru" (VG) (Japanese)
Theme Song Performance (OP/ED) for "Root Double -Before Crime * After Days-" (Visual novel) (Japanese)

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/lulihorta) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/lulihorta)

Luísa Horta is a Brazilian actress, voice actress, and dubbing director.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Kirra Foster / Skye (Valorant)
- Female Protagonist (Tower of Fantasy)
- Savannah Miller (The Circle EUA)
- Mary Anne (2nd dub; The Baby-Sitters Club)
- Kira Yukimura (Sony's dub; Teen Wolf)
- Alicia (Stuck 2017)
- Liz Cheney (Vice)
- Oh Hui-Ji (A Love So Beautiful)
!~

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/andrerinaldidub/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/andrerinaldidub) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/andrerinaldidub) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@andrerinaldidub) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJB9-DmISWwZaBMmDqK7i2A) | [Site Web](https://www.andrerinaldi.com)

André Augusto Rinaldi is a Brazilian actor, voice actor and dubbing director. He currently directs at Grupo Macias and at DuBrasil. He is the cousin of the voice actor [Fabricio Rinaldi](https://anilist.co/staff/209058/).
